body.name: Furnulem White Tall Dresser for Bedroom,Vertical Storage Tower Unit and End Table with 6 Drawers, Nightstand Furniture with Fabric Drawer Organizer in Living Room,Closet,Entryway,Hallyway
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 20 hrs 53 mins
features: 【Reinforced and Sturdy End Table】Our clothing storage stands out with its sturdy construction, featuring a reinforced metal frame. The back of the bedside table is equiped with more reinforced X-type crossbar, which offers high strength support and ensure years of use. Adjustable feet can adapt to uneven ground, will make it more stable.

【Versatile Storage Drawers】Organize your essentials effortlessly with vertical 6 drawer furniture for bedroom, offering ample space for kids, nursery, or men and women. The industrial fabric end table is perfect for keeping your clothing, accessories, and personal belongings neatly stored and easily accessible.

【Functional & Stunning Design】This vertical design dresser can be easily placed in bedroom, entryway, closet, dorm, etc., compact and practical. This small bedside table is suitable for compact spaces, bedrooms, guest rooms, closets, nurseries, entryways, small apartments and more - can be used as a bedside storage nightstand, storage cabinet, end table for sofa, office supply storage, children's nightstand, or baby nursery table.

【High Quality & Safe Materials】: Drawers are made of breathable non-woven synthetic fabric; sturdy steel frame and durable MDF wood tabletop enhance the overall quality of the night stand; anti-tip device protects your family; hardware included for easy assembly; easy to take care of, can be wiped down with a damp cloth and left to dry.

【Easy Assembly】The package contains all the accessories and hardware kits as well as the instructions that are shipped with this product. The instruction manual is easy to understand with clear step-by-step and logical illustrations and the user only needs to follow the steps to complete the installation with ease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just got it in today and pot it together. Easy to put together. The frame is sturdy and has cross bars in the back for extra support. The drawer fronts look like wood but I think it's for like balsa wood. However, the drawers are cloth. Harder wood top so you can place breakable on it with no issues. I'm loving it. Totally recommend if you need more drawer space with limited space in your home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This dresser is really sturdy and simple to put together! For the price it’s a great deal. 4 stars because the drawer pulls are a cheap plastic and some of the bolts/screws were somewhat stripped but overall a really great experience and product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect in my child's closet!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for a small space in my child's closet. It fit perfect and it's a great size to keep his socks, undies, and extra clothing we don't hang. I love the color and will buy a bigger one for his room when he's a bit older. I am so glad this was easy and quick to set up because I'm normally not great at setting things up. The Furnulem Tall Dresser with 6 Drawers is something I would buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So my husband put it together yesterday follow the directions and OMG it looks great exactly what they show you in the picture and what it says it's that, and the drawers are so easy to pull in I mean let me rephrase that pull out pull in or pushing plenty of space for your undergarments clothes socks and if you have one of those drawers that have like everything in it from perfume to colognes and you know beautiful Works awesome the top is really hard and it's beautiful it's just all beautiful all in all it's great I definitely recommend that to anybody and everybody.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Warning!! Bottom and sides of the drawers is fabric. UGH.
reviews.reviewText: The bottom and sides of each of the drawers is fabric, only the front of the drawer is some sort of wood (solid or pressed, but obviously just for show). Even worse it's not a woven fabric (like canvas), it's pressed together and paper-like (non-woven). I cannot imagine what the drawers could hold without sagging one into the other or getting holes punched in them. Not worth $5, let alone the >$50 that's being charged for it.I unfortunately waited too long to open the box to assemble it otherwise it would have gone straight back!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Material and chipped on corner
reviews.reviewText: This was smaller in person. The wood was chipped on top. The fabric on the dresser is wrinkled. It was very easy to assemble following the instructions provided.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was very easy to assemble. I am 68 and it took me about 30-40 minutes to get it together. The instructions were very simple and gave both written and picture instruction for each step. The only disappointment is on 2 drawers the material used for the face of each drawer was not pulled tight. And 1 drawer there are 2 marks, almost cuts but on the surface only, on the drawer face. (You can see in the picture.) But, for what I am using this for I don’t think it was worth sending for a replacement. And it’s not going to be in a location where it can be seen by guests. Overall I am happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It will work
reviews.reviewText: This will work for bathroom towels and stuff. It took me 15 minutes to put together and just a little bit under that. Comes with everything you need and even a few extra screws. The only issue I have is one of my drawers seems to have a break in it because if I try to straighten the top, you can hear it snapping back-and-forth like something in there is broken. Another drawer has ripples behind the vinyl that I can’t get smoothed out. I have one in our entryway that is completely fabric with finger holes to open the drawers that I prefer. These handles on this model are pretty small for normal human fingers. One I have in my closet is also completely fabric drawers with cute wooden handles. Both I purchased on here with this one being my least favorite.
